verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
C
Come unto me
All who are weak
Weary and heavy-laden
Gentle am I
Humble in heart
And you shall find
Rest for your soul

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
All things are given
Unto those who believe
Princes and lowely ones
His blessings receive

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And just when I think
That means everyone but me
Jesus comes beckoning to me

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Come unto me
All who are weak
Weary and heavy-laden
Gentle am I
Humble in heart
And you shall find
Rest for your soul

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We are His little ones
Children of God
Children and fellow-heirs
Of His kingdom come
And we share the greatest love
The world has ever seen
Here in the Lord's family

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Enter His holy gates
Just as you are
No need for a happy face
Just come with your heart
And Jesus will bring us
A joyful melody
If only His calling we heed
